name: Junkyard Simulator parking 2017
description:
Junkyard Simulator

Welcome to the Junk Yard! Take control of Four vastly different trucks, with unique handling and demands of your driving skills.

Free 3D JunkYard Garbage Truck Parking simulation game for the real skilled drivers out there. Start driving this amazingly realistic 3D garbage truck without the need of a drivers license.

Collect different check points and reach to the destination and if your truck will touch any scrap yard then your game is crashed.
Featuring stunning graphics and exciting parking missions, try the most original parking game EVER!
The 3D truck will be easy to control because of the steering wheel and the pedals on the screen.

we challenge you to complete the 20 different levels of this free toxic truck driver parking. if you can do this you can proudly call yourself
a real garbage man!

Key features:

=> The driving physics are amazingly realistic
=> easy to control, this makes it fun to play for all ages
=> an amazing 3D game and 3D city to drive in with your garbage truck
=> a fun to play free 3D wasteyard Garbage Truck Parking simulation game
